# Typos Happen to Everyone

![](assets/david-asking-for-help.png)

# Typos Happen to Everyone

::: {.large}
```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true

get_acs(
  year = 2019,
  geography = "county",
  geometry = TRUE,
  state = "OR",
  variables = "B01003_001"
) %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  mutate(name = str_remove(name, " County")) %>%
  rename(
    poulation = estimate,
    county = name
  ) %>%
  select(county, population)
```
:::
